title: Apple Inc. - Wikipedia
snippet: Apple became the first publicly traded US company to be valued at over $1 trillion in 2018, and, as of October 2025, is valued at just over $4 trillion. Apple has received criticism regarding its contractors' labor conditions, its relationship with trade unions, its environmental practices, and its corporate ethics, including anti-competitive tactics, materials sourcing, and its acquisitions of smaller businesses.

title: Apple Stock Ownership - Who Owns Apple in 2025? | WallStreetZen
snippet: Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) is owned by 62.05% institutional shareholders, 0.12% Apple insiders, and 37.83% retail investors. Vanguard Group Inc is the largest individual Apple shareholder, owning 1.40B shares representing 9.47% of the company.
